Activity: Check emails and handle any urgent requests. Make sure I have some coffee.
Final preparation for the training session. Review the materials and ensure everything is in order.
Conduct the training session for data abstractors on the protocol, EHR data entry, and quality control procedures. Actively engage with the participants and answer their questions.
Continue the training session, focusing on practical exercises and hands-on activities. Provide individual support and guidance to the participants.
Gather feedback from the participants on the training session. Analyze the feedback to identify areas for improvement in future sessions.
Document the training session and create a summary report. Include key findings, recommendations, and action items.
Wrap up for the week. Reflect on the accomplishments and challenges encountered. Listen to music.
